snippet: McDonald’s shut a restaurant near its headquarters in Oak Brook, Ill., after the area was swamped by protesters calling for higher wages.
abstract: McDonald’s shuts restaurant near its headquarters in Oak Brook, Ill, after area is swamped by protesters calling for higher wages and union representation.
lead_paragraph: McDonald’s shut a restaurant near its headquarters in Oak Brook, Ill., after the area was swamped by protesters calling for higher wages.

headline.print_headline: McDonald’s Location Shuttered After Wage Protesters Descend
headline.main: McDonald’s Location Shuttered After Wage Protesters Descend
